Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Transgenic and nontransgenic littermates received kanamycin ( 400 mg / kg body weight / day ) for 10 days beginning on day 10 after birth .

Explanation:

In the given paragraph, the "Chemical" entity is "kanamycin". It is a type of antibiotic used in the treatment of various bacterial infections. The other terms such as "transgenic", "nontransgenic", "littermates", "body weight", "day", and "10" are not chemical entities.
